description: Frozen lychees and refreshing coconut water make this speedy sorbet perfect for cooling down on warmer days.
keywords: Sorbet,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Coconut, Lychee & Lime Sorbet Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.3 cup coconut water, save 2 tsp for later

recipeInstructions.text: Tip all of the ingredients into a high speed blender and whizz until smooth.
Serve immediately with extra lime zest on top, if desired.
